title: MachineAnnotationServiceRequest
description: Automated annotation services that enhance biodiversity data

schema:name.description: Name of the Machine Annotation Service as provided by the user, https://schema.org/name

schema:description.description: Description of the Machine Annotation Service as provided by the user, https://schema.org/description
examples: A service that links GBIF records to a DiSSCo Digital Specimen. It creates an EntityRelationship indicating the relationship

ods:containerImage.description: URI of the image of the containerized application

ods:TargetDigitalObjectFilter.description: Filters describing the criteria that must be met in order to apply the MAS. No filters implies the MAS may run on *any* digital object. Field names are given in JSON paths, and accepted values for that field are provided as an arrays

schema:creativeWorkStatus.description: The current status of the service, https://schema.org/creativeWorkStatus

schema:codeRepository.description: Link to code base of MAS, https://schema.org/codeRepository

schema:programmingLanguage.description: The programming language of the MAS, https://schema.org/programmingLanguage

ods:serviceAvailability.description: Availability commitment of the service provider as described in the SLA

schema:maintainer.description: Party maintaining the code, could be an schema:Organisation or a schema:Person

ods:dependency.description: Handles from other MAS that this MAS depends on

items.description: Handle of the Machine Annotation Service that this MAS depends on

schema:ContactPoint.description: The contact point for support and information for the MAS, https://schema.org/ContactPoint

schema:description.description: Description of the contact point, https://schema.org/description

schema:email.description: Email of the contact point, https://schema.org/email

schema:url.description: Email of the contact point, https://schema.org/email

schema:telephone.description: Telephone number of the contact point, https://schema.org/telephone

ods:topicName.description: Kafka topic through which the MAS receives messages. Defaults to PID of MAS

ods:maxReplicas.description: The maximum amount of this MAS that can simultaneously run without causing issues

ods:batchingPermitted.description: Whether or not this MAS can create Batch Annotations. MAS outputs must then comply with batchMetadata, see https://schemas.dissco.tech/schemas/annotations/0.1.0/annotation-event.json

ods:timeToLive.description: Time in milliseconds the MAS message may remain in the Kafka Queue before being marked as timed out. Min 1 hour.

ods:TombstoneMetadata.description: Object containing the tombstone metadata of the object

ods:hasEnvironmentalVariable.description: Environmental variables to supply to the MAS, non-sensitive

ods:hasSecretVariable.description: Secret variables to supply to the MAS
